title: Patterns of time and distance
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Malcolm Otton and Edwin Moses
brief_description: Sets out the overall pattern of Australia’s development from timeless isolation to our modern urbanised society considering “the changing Australia”, and the problems change generates. Through communications and transport ideas are transmitted to this southern continent. A film of concepts owing much to Philbrick’s area organisation of the world. FDA NO: 1809
